title: OPL Prediction Contest Split 2 results!
body:
http://oce.lolesports.com/sites/default/files/styles/news_featured_image_full/public/opl_split_2_tipping_0.jpg?itok=XN8bop0L

At the beginning of split 2 we asked you all to predict where you thought the 8 OPL teams would place at the end of it all. Yesterday we finished up the regular season and we now know the [final standings.](http://oce.lolesports.com/standings)

CONGRATULATIONS to the ONLY 3 summoners to guess all 8 correct;
Monster
DefinitelyNotMat
Kuudah

You each win 33,500 RP!

**Fun facts!**

* 58% picked Chiefs for 1st place
* 36% picked Dire Wolves for 2nd place (oops)
* Only 12.5% of entries picked SIN to finish 5th

Hope you all enjoyed the regular season of OPL split 2! Remember there are still semi finals on the 20th and 23rd of July and the [Grand finals at Luna Park!](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oplfinals-2015/)

replies.body: Dammit! I was hoping i could win the 2nd split contest >.> Cos if i did, i would've gotten 83,500 rp now >.> {{item:3070}}

>Only 12.5% of entries picked SIN to finish 5th

I feel like this "fun fact" is kinda iffy, simply because there are 8 teams, and 1/8th of people picked Sin for 5th.
wow... so many RP, congrats to all the winners.
